page.title: 14SERVICES IN DUNSFORD AREA
page.content: Doctors. Dr Miller and Dr.Dudbridge in partnership.Three surgeries,Cheriton Bishop,Christow and Dunsford.They have their own dispensary. Hospitals. Royal Devon and Exeter and Specialist hospitals in Exeter. Cottage hospital in Moretonhampstead. District nurse and midwife call. School Health Services. Visiting nurse doctor and dentist.Dentist has mobile surgery which usually stops at Christow.Area children are taken there or to private dentist. Shops. Post office and general store. Farm shop Travelling Shops.Butchers,bakers, milkmen,fishman and general grocers call at houses. Garages. There are two garages with servicing,repairs and petrol sales. Bus service from Exeter to Chagford passes through village.
